attributes.action: Stop the torture of students in Bangladesh
attributes.additional_details: On 29th of July 2018 school going students were killed by a reckless bus driver. The students protested with slogans on the same bus stand. Since then, all students of Bangladesh are protesting for safer roads and more strict regulations.Their intention was never to harm a single person. The POLICE AND PEOPLE OF CHATRO LEAGUE tortured students. The students were trying to defend themselves with sticks and tree branches that they've found on the streets.
attributes.background: Students in Bangladesh are being tortured with tear shell, they beat students brutally and raped the female students (on 4th August 2018). 4 students have been murdered and 4 female students have been raped.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition urging the UK Government to raise this issue with the government of Bangladesh.
